scripts.test:single: CYPRESS_TL_RUN_ID=123 CYPRESS_TL_TEST_ID=123 npx cypress run --spec e2e/overloop-one-test.feature --browser chrome --headless
scripts.test:local: npm run clear:logs && npx cypress run --spec e2e --browser chromium --headless
scripts.testerloop-local-one: rm -rf ./logs && CYPRESS_TL_RUN_ID=123 CYPRESS_TL_TEST_ID=123 npx cypress run --spec e2e/overloop-one-test.feature --browser chrome
scripts.test: npm run clear:logs && npm run test:single ; npm run regression
